data.title: Michael Miller - 2020-21 - Men's Basketball
data.meta_description: Michael Miller (32) F  - TREVECCA NOTES2019-20Played in 19 games this season ... averaged 1.2 points and 0.4 rebounds over 4.5 minutes played per game ... shot .500
data.text:
TREVECCA NOTES

2019-20

Played in 19 games this season ... averaged 1.2 points and 0.4 rebounds over 4.5 minutes played per game ... shot .500 (10-20) from the field and was .333 (3-9) from the free-throw line ... scored 23 points and grabbed eight rebounds ... produced five assists and had one steal.

HIGH SCHOOL NOTES

Played at Eastern High School in Waverly, Ohio for coach Tom Barrick ... as a junior, helped lead the Eagles to a 21-4 record, the sectional championship and were the district runner-ups. ... averaged 15.8 points and shot 59% from the field last season ... was also a Wendy's Heisman Award winner and a member of the National Honor Society.

His parents are Jamie and Tammy Miller. His sister, Holly, is a Christian singer and songwriter known by her stage name Hollyn.
